suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for cause_source_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.death` as record2 where death.person_id = record2.person_id and cause_source_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset._concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for death_type_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.death` as record2 where death.person_id = record2.person_id and death_type_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset._concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for cause_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.death` as record2 where death.person_id = record2.person_id and cause_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset._concept_ids_suppression`))
